subject: If I wanted to order Haptics for Logitech two pedal
description_text:
Do you sell a kit for a Logitech RS Pedal Set

Maybe I missed the kit on your website? I am in the US so I would need a
110/120V setup. Could you put together a kit price for me?

Regards,

-- 
Thomas C Sams

conversations.body_text: Hi Smas Mot, We don’t currently sell any accessories that are logically related to this. Could you please provide some photos to illustrate the situation? That will help me check and assist you more accurately.

On the Logitech RS Pedals (
https://www.logitechg.com/en-us/shop/p/rs-pedals.941-000306) does your
haptic device work with a Playstation PS5 and Grand Turismo 7?
